void OnRemoveBreakpoint (  wxCommandEvent &  event  )  [private]
 

private OnRemoveBreakpoint Removes a breakpoint from this file

Parameters:
event wxCommandEvent & The generated menu event
Returns:
void
Remarks:
This doesn't clean out the marker handle that STC gives us,

since there's no way to check what marker handles are on a given line.

Orphaned marker handles are cleaned up in GetBreakpoints.

Author:
Mark Erikson
Date:
04-22-2004
